text: Na'ankure ha' vahe'mo'za nezmahe'za osi'ama zamatresnaza naga'mo'za Jerusalemi kumapintira atiramiza ne-enageno, knazampintima ofrizama osi'a naga'ma manisnamo'za Saioni agonaretira egahaze. Hankavenentake Ra Anumzamo'na e'ina hu'za fore hugahie hu'na hankave antahintahi retro hu'noankino, tamagerfa huno ana zana efore hugahie.
